questions.question: The primary objective of financial reporting is to provide information useful to:

correct.text: Financial reporting is intended to provide information useful to investors and creditors.

incorrect.A: Management is not the primary audience.
incorrect.D: Regulators are not the primary users.

questions.question: Which qualitative characteristic enhances usefulness of information?

correct.text: Comparability allows users to identify similarities and differences.

incorrect.B: Consistency helps comparability but is not a primary characteristic.
incorrect.D: Neutrality is part of faithful representation.
